dcterms:description: Interactive Emotional Dyadic Motion Capture (IEMOCAP) dataset consists of five sessions with dyadic affective interactions. In each session, two actors act out scenarios which are either scripted or improvised. The conversations have been segmented into utterances which are then labeled by three annotators for emotions such as happy, sad, angry, excitement, and neutral.
dcterms:title: IEMOCAP

dcterms:creator: C. Busso
S. Parthasarathy
A. Burmania
M. AbdelWahab
N. Sadoughi
E. M. Provost
dcterms:description: MSP-IMPROV has actors participating in dyadic conversations across six sessions and includes a set of pre-defined 20 target sentences that are spoken with different emotions depending on the context of conversation. The dataset contains 7798 utterances belonging to the same four emotion classes.
dcterms:title: MSP-IMPROV
